name: Swallow's Tail
description:
STORY

Play a young female glaciologist as she is dragged into events leading to first contact with an alien civilization. A gripping story filled with adventure, romance, and fateful decisions.

GAMEPLAY

Uncover secrets buried beneath the Antarctic ice as you build your relationship with characters and navigate their conflicting interests. What will this encounter bring to humanity?

  • While it's hard to please everyone, be aware that ruining your relationship with someone might backfire later.
  • Most of the characters will face their own difficult choice at some point. Whether they listen to your advice or not depends on you.
  • Romance, while not obligatory, is possible with female, male, and alien characters.
CHARACTERS

Chapter 1 introduces two characters, with more to come in the future.

  • Celeste -  a free-spirited, forthright biologist with an undying love for science
  • Timur - a reserved, resourceful radio technician haunted by his past.
TEAM

This game is currently developed by solo dev Oksana Kovalenko with support from her friends and family.

DEVELOPMENT

The game is still in development. Chapter 1 is available now, with 3 more chapters to be released in 2023.
